name: Inside Eden
description:
this game is a little prototype of a retro metroidvania, heavily inspired by old castlevanias

made for the Metroidvania Month 19

CONTROLS

Attack - Z

Dash - X

Jump - Space

Move - AD / Left , right arrow keys

Notes:

you can save by pressing the up button in the middle of a save room

Sometimes full screen may not work on the web version, just refresh the page and it should be solved

CREDITS

 Music  by Estudio Cafofo http://estudiocafofo.com
